segments.text: It's my girlfriend . I guess she's playing the army game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I saw her dating with her ex-boyfriend again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand that . But I think maybe it's not a date . You are taking the matter too much to heart .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe . But it still gets on my nerves .
segments.speaker: S2
